info.title: AWS Artifact Agent
info.description: This API provides functionality to query AWS Artifact content and download documents

get.description: Lists AWS Artifact reports using pagination

parameters.description: Maximum number of reports to return per page. Default and maximum value is 5.

schema.title: Page Size
schema.description: Maximum number of reports to return per page. Default and maximum value is 5.

parameters.name: page_size

parameters.description: Page number to return. Default is 1.

schema.title: Page Number
schema.description: Page number to return. Default is 1.

parameters.name: page_number

get.description: Returns the total number of report pages

parameters.description: Maximum number of reports per page. Default and maximum value is 5.

schema.title: Page Size
schema.description: Maximum number of reports per page. Default and maximum value is 5.

parameters.name: page_size

get.description: Returns a URL to download the report document, not the document itself. The returned URL will contain X-AMZ-* querystrings for authenticated access.
Search for reports based on keywords

parameters.description: Keywords to search for in report names and descriptions.

schema.title: Search Keywords
schema.description: Keywords to search for in report names and descriptions.

parameters.name: search_keywords

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return. Default and maximum value is 5.

schema.title: Max Results
schema.description: Maximum number of results to return. Default and maximum value is 5.

parameters.name: max_results

get.description: Get the current date and time. Example: /current-date
